com.esri.mo2.svr.map
Interface ServerDisplayManager

All Superinterfaces:
DisplayManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseServerDisplayManager
public interface ServerDisplayManager
extends DisplayManager

This interface adds serveral new methods to the com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.DisplayManager to provide support for server Map functionality. It has the same role as com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.DisplayManager to com.esri.mo2.ui.bean.Map class in that it manages the drawing process for the server Map object.
